description:
All your chats in one app. Yes, really.

A single app to chat on iMessage, WhatsApp, and 13 other chat networks. You can search, snooze, or archive messages. And with a unified inbox, you’ll never miss a message again.
Fixed & Improved
Fixed app not opening for Windows/Linux users with certain system language settings — If you are effected please re-download Beeper
If you archive a chat just after sending a message it should stay archived
Patched a bug that caused rooms to be stuck unread
Fixed instances where sometimes read receipts or reactions would cause the chat to no longer be scrolled to the bottom
